column4: The side menu in Unity (Dash?) is being reset everytime I switch user. All my personally added programs get removed and it reverts to default. Can it be fixed somehow?
that is a personalized "menu" so it is how it should work
Launcher might be the correct name
I think you get me wrong. If another user is using his account, MY launcher gets reset to default.
oh I see. Then it is not how it should work ;/
Have you seen any bug reports on that matter?
